overview: Shammies are four curious little creatures: Sockie, Hankie, Mitten, and Pillow. They are eager to explore the world and find out answers to tricky questions, like - who lives in the bathroom?, can one get well by eating candy?, what is the best place to hide? Luckily, their dear companion Mr Cat is always around to help.  The adventures of Shammies, which are particularly enjoyed by pre-schoolers and are screened at film festivals around the world, are compiled in a collection of cut-out animation shorts, namely: How Shammies Bathed, How Shammies Guessed, How Shammies Teeter-tottered, How Shammies Were Getting Married, How Shammies Played Hide and Seek, How Shammies Got Well, How Shammies Built A House, How Shammies Tidied-Up, How Shammies Told Time, How Shammies Travelled, How Shammies Had Breakfast.
title: The Shammies
